goals__remit:
Esterline Belgium's toplevel goal is to be a high-performing aerospace and defense company whose engaged employees deliver value through world-class products, services and technologies in the domain of displays, display systems and visualization systems for demanding applications. 
Typical applications include defense, avionics, air traffic control and simulation systems. 
Esterline Belgium has facilities in Belgium, France, Canada and USA, totalling nearly 800 employees, of which nearly 500 in Europe. Esterline Technologies Corporation employs 13500 persons, of which over 4000 in Europe.
relevant_communication:
Esterline Belgium actively participates in H2020 research projects (e.g. Clean Sky 2). 
Esterline Belgium actively contributes to collaborative policy/regulation development with EASA through its ASD Europe membership (e.g. multicore certification, EASA/FAA harmonisation).
